name: Send country-based user & session report from Google Analytics to Google Sheets
description:
Gain deeper insights into your websiteâ€™s traffic with our automated report that sends country-specific user and session data to Google Sheets every Friday. Easily adjust the scheduling to align with your analytical needs.
The scenario is scheduled to execute every Friday at 17:00 which you can change in the schedule setting by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
